Â  Â  Type: blacklist
Â  Â  # If you want, you can have this list only apply to one world, otherwise it applies to all worlds
Â  Â  # World: world
Â  Â  # You can also have the list apply only to one group, otherwise it applies for all groups

Â  Â  # You can look up the material name by item ID in game by typing /res material <id>
Â  Â  # Alternativly, you can simply use the item ID in the list, but its less descriptive and harder to see what the list allows or dissallows at a glance
